Name: Gaze of the Far Sea
Description:
"The sea's gaze reaches farther than the wind, longer than the waves.
The bowstring draws tight, as if binding the skyline tightly.
The arrow carry the breath of the tide, crossing the boundary of water and sky.
It always finds its destination, reaching where the heart yearns."
(Excerpt from "Book of the Depths IV")
Description2: When equipped, the weapon's appearance will be replaced with: Gaze of the Far Sea.
